name: Ext_R5_PlanDefinition_ac_pa_type
title: Cross-version Extension for R5.PlanDefinition.action.participant.type for use in FHIR R4
description: This cross-version extension represents PlanDefinition.action.participant.type from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/PlanDefinition|5.0.0 for use in FHIR R4.

element.short: careteam | device | group | healthcareservice | location | organization | patient | practitioner | practitionerrole | relatedperson
element.definition: The type of participant in the action.
element.comment: `PlanDefinition.action.participant.type` maps to R4 `PlanDefinition.action.participant.type`. So is mapped as Equivalent.

element.short: careteam | device | group | healthcareservice | location | organization | patient | practitioner | practitionerrole | relatedperson
element.definition: The type of participant in the action.
element.comment: `PlanDefinition.action.participant.type` maps to R4 `PlanDefinition.action.participant.type`. So is mapped as Equivalent.

binding.description: The type of participant in the activity.
